meanings.definition: The quality or state of being receptive.
meanings.sent1: Her receptivenesses to new ideas made her a great team player.
meanings.sent2: His receptivenesses to feedback helped him improve his work.
meanings.sent3: The robot's receptivenesses to commands was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The garden's receptivenesses to sunlight determined the growth of the plants.
meanings.sent5: The child's receptivenesses to learning was inspiring to the teacher.

meanings.definition: The ability or willingness to receive or accept something.
meanings.sent1: The team's receptivenesses to feedback led to their success.
meanings.sent2: She showed receptivenesses to the new technology by attending the training.
meanings.sent3: The cat's receptivenesses to treats was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's receptivenesses to climbers challenged their skills.
meanings.sent5: The company's receptivenesses to change determined its adaptability.
